custom_css: .ave-sub-t {font-size: 11px; font-family: avenir next demi bold; letter-spacing: 0.12em; text-transform: uppercase;}

settings.custom_liquid:
How to exchange / return

Exchanging to something else?


All exchanges are free!

All exchanges, must be registered in this return portal


The costs of return is fully covered by us - you will be provided with a free return label to use

Exchange options

To another size
Return portal: Choose your exchange reason, then choose the size you need
To another color or another model
Return portal: Choose ”Store Credit”
To a gift card
Return portal: Choose ”Store Credit”

Returning for a refund?


Buy a returnlabel or use your own

All returns, must be registered in this return portal

Note: Exchanges are always free!

You can exchange to any model, size or even to a gift card. More info above Exchanging to something else?
When returning for a refund, you have the option to use your own shipping label, or to purchase one from us.

Return label price list - Within EU
Returning from Denmark: 60 DKK
Returning from Germany: 20 EUR
Returning from France: 25 EUR
Returning from Netherlands: 25 EUR
Returning from Belgium: 25 EUR
Returning from Austria: 25 EUR
Returning from Spain: 25 EUR
Returning from Sweden: 150 SEK
Returning from Italy: 25 EUR
Returning from Greece: 25 EUR
Returning from Other countries inside EU: 25 EUR

Return label price list - Outside EU
Returning fr om United Kingdom: 20 GBP
Returning fr om United States: 30 U SD
Returning fr om Switzerland: 30 CHF
Returning fr om Canada: 50 CAD
Returning from Australia: 60 AUD
Returning from Norway: 300 NOK
Returning fr om Other countries outside EU: 40 EUR

Note: we offer this shipping label service to provide an added convenience, you always have the option to use your own shipping label.

For more information about our terms of service click here
